backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI animation features tied to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high-level summaries for all major frontend source files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config and OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes with global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling view state, evasive button logic, heart bursts, and accepted-view animations.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationHeart: Generates and animates floating heart particles continuously across the screen.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Renders a radial burst of animated hearts at a given click position.
frontend/src/components/RedRoseBouquet3D: 3D bouquet component using React Three Fiber with animated roses and fallback behavior.
Centered layout wrapper providing a styled card container for all views.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, loading stored identities, and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode styles, and custom animations including bouquet fade-in and glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state and features for adding a 1s bouquet fade-in and pulsing glow on the Yes page.
